title: Assembly & ordering

steps.title: Unpack frame
steps.desc: Remove frame components from packaging. Verify all parts against the included checklist.

steps.title: Assemble legs
steps.desc: Click-lock the column tubes into the crossbar. No tools required for this step.

steps.title: Attach feet
steps.desc: Screw levelling feet into column bases. Adjust for uneven floors as needed.

steps.title: Mount desktop
steps.desc: Place desktop face-down on soft surface. Align frame and secure with 6 included screws.

steps.title: Connect power
steps.desc: Route motor cables through cable spine. Connect control box and plug into mains power.

steps.title: Flip & calibrate
steps.desc: Carefully flip desk upright. Run auto-calibration by holding ▼ button for 5 seconds.
